description:
REVENGE 3: papyrus and the quest for revenge! itch io page

hi, if it was'nt cllear enough; this my game and not yours. ok,

(this orite will be the new one, after the demo)

in this game you play as and fight papyrus. maybe some other person if you're lucky.
this game is currently in development and will probably be in development for another year. if you're worried, don't worry because there is probably a demo for you to download ! 

by downloading or viewing this game you agree to the following terms:

  1. papyrus can and will kill you at any time
  2. you release piston and haloboi3 of any charges (they have changed as people)
  3. don't eat my chocolate
